GenericConnectorDescriptor.description: This connector provides access to the Docusign Click API. For more information, click here: https://developers.docusign.com/docs/click-api/click101/

field.label: Override OpenAPI Spec
field.helpText: This will override the custom specification included with the connector.

field.label: Authentication Type
field.helpText: Identifies the authentication type for the connection. <boomi-help id="ATOMSPHERE:9BB88920-7DB1-45EA-B650-F9C1244C24E2">Learn more</boomi-help> about authentication.

field.label: Preemptive authentication
field.helpText: Applicable for Basic and OAuth 2.0 authentication. When selected, the connector builds and sends the authorization header to the HTTP server ahead of time in the initial request. Use preemptive authentication when you trust the server and to reduce the overhead of making an additional request. When cleared, the authorization header is not sent to the HTTP server ahead of time in the initial request. The server sends the response back to the connector indicating the information it expects to authenticate. You can view the logging information (equivalent to the "FINE" setting) by selecting the Atom's Enable Debug Logging property (com.boomi.container.debug) check box.
